title: Family Margherita Special
description: Premium fresh mozzarella & fresh organic basil with olive oil.
longDescription: Our signature family Margherita is made with handmade thin crust dough, topped with imported Italian mozzarella, fresh basil leaves from our garden, and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.

title: Double Cheese Blast
description: A heavy layer of cheddar and mozzarella for cheese lovers.
longDescription: The ultimate comfort food. This pizza features a thick layer of melted cheddar inside the crust and gooey mozzarella on top. Perfect for a family movie night!

title: Spicy Chicken Supreme
description: Spicy chicken chunks with capsicum and red paprika.
longDescription: If your family loves heat, this is the one. Loaded with marinated spicy chicken, crunchy capsicum, onions, and spicy red paprika flakes.

title: Garden Fresh Veggie
description: Loaded with mushrooms, olives, and bell peppers.
longDescription: A healthy yet delicious choice. Packed with fresh mushrooms, black olives, green bell peppers, and sweet corn on a whole wheat base.

title: BBQ Meat Feast
description: Topped with BBQ chicken, beef pepperoni, and sausage.
longDescription: The king of all meat pizzas. Features smoky BBQ sauce, tender chicken pieces, spicy beef pepperoni, and sliced Italian sausages.

title: Creamy Seafood Delight
description: Shrimp and calamari with a creamy white sauce base.
longDescription: A premium choice for seafood fans. Made with fresh shrimp and calamari rings over a rich, creamy Alfredo white sauce base instead of tomato sauce.
